title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2021 Comments on Hotel Quarantine
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Home Secretary, on 15 February 2021.

The public will not forgive the UK government for getting this wrong.
